roleset.name: prognosticate

example.name: speculate an NP
example.text: A spokesman declined to speculate about possible reductions in force .

example.name: speculate an NP
example.text: Mr. Sherwood speculated that the leeway that Sea Containers has means that Temple would have to `` substantially increase their bid if they 're going to top us . ''

propbank.arg: that the leeway that Sea Containers has means that Temple would have to `` substantially increase their bid if they 're going to top us

example.name: S introduced by a prep
example.text: Analysts were n't willing to speculate on how much money Carnival might lose through deposits .

propbank.arg: on how much money Carnival might lose through deposits

example.name: nominal rel: speculating
example.text: This is just a bunch of reckless speculating , outrageousness , and foolishness ; absolutely not what a good - minded national should do , not to mention what a wise man should do .

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Indeed , he admits how he and Gleason , on a 2004 survey of bowhead whales , observed four drowned polar bears after a harsh Arctic storm , leading to their speculation that the deaths resulted from global warming .

propbank.arg: that the deaths resulted from global warming

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: She especially enjoyed his speculation about a " secret history of the United States : "

propbank.arg: about a " secret history of the United States : "

roleset.note: SPECULATE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'speculating' based on BOLT-7. Member of Vncls conjecture-29.5-1. (from speculate.01-v)
SPECULATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, speculate.01. Corresponds to VNcls conjecture-29.5-1. (from speculation.01-n)
SPECULATING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from speculating.01-n)
arg1 and arg2 were a single arg in the verb frame, but have been split here due to the possibility that they will both occur, in keeping with more recent rolesets. (from speculation.01-n)
